name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior IT Engineer with 8 years of experience in managing and securing enterprise environments, specializing in **Microsoft 365**, **Entra ID**, **Azure**, **PowerShell**, **Microsoft Graph**, and **Intune** for enhanced enterprise solutions. Proven track record in implementing **Conditional Access**, **DLP**, and **RBAC** to ensure compliance with industry standards, alongside expertise in **Teams**, **Exchange Online**, **SharePoint**, and **OneDrive** for streamlined collaboration. Skilled in **Identity Management** principles, incident response protocols, and security compliance frameworks, including **OAuth**, **OIDC**, and **SAML**.

I leverage advanced automation techniques to enhance efficiency and incident management, while my foundational knowledge in network protocols such as **DNS**, **HTTP/S**, and **TCP/IP** provides a robust backdrop for problem-solving in complex environments. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience with cloud services, having developed solutions that incorporate **Microsoft Sentinel** and **Purview** to enhance data security and compliance measures. My original strengths lie in full-stack development utilizing **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, complemented by cloud architecture insights gained from previous roles in high-performance sectors such as healthcare and finance.
